name: Sandstorm
printed_effect:
For each Elestral that is not {earth}-Enchanted,
return it to its owner's hand if it is in Defense
Position. Otherwise, change it to Defense
Position. Until the End Phase those
Elestrals cannot change Position.
effect: For each Elestral that is not {earth}-Enchanted, return it to its owner's hand if it is in Defense Position. Otherwise, change it to Defense Position. Until the next turn those Elestrals cannot change Position.
